definition: surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: The sunshine bodes well for our barbecue.
sentences.chinese: 明媚的陽光對我們的烤肉野餐是個吉兆。

sentences.english: Ever since the 3rd dynasty drinking it while eating bread was considered a good omen.
sentences.chinese: 早在第三王朝，喝酒吃麪包被視爲是吉兆。

sentences.english: The company will be regarded as the rule of Huangdi future generations, peace and prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 這一吉兆被視爲黃帝之統治將千秋萬代，和平繁榮。

sentences.english: He took her gentle words as an auspice of happiness.
sentences.chinese: 他把她溫柔的話當作是幸福的吉兆。

sentences.english: He took her gentle words as an auspice of happiness.
sentences.chinese: 他把她話當作是幸福的吉兆。

sentences.english: The news bodes well for her.
It's a good sign to see larger tech companies in the evolution of this industry.
sentences.chinese: 大型科技公司參與這個行業的發展，這是吉兆。

sentences.english: This bodes well to the country.
This augurs well for the future.

definition: fateful accident/inauspicious matter (involving death or casualties)
to add a son to the family
flood of good fortune fills the heavens (idiom); a lucky sign
to predict by divining/to look into the future
